What are the treatments for familial thoracic aortic aneurysm and dissection ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of familial TAAD:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Thoracic Aortic Aneurysms and Aortic Dissections  - Genetic Testing Registry: Aortic aneurysm, familial thoracic 2  - Genetic Testing Registry: Aortic aneurysm, familial thoracic 4  - Genetic Testing Regist
